mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INVENTORY (STOR_NAME, AMOUNT, CROP_ID) VALUES (#{cropName}, 0, #{cropId})
INSERT INTO INVENTORY (STOR_NAME, AMOUNT, CROP_ID) VALUES (#{cropName}, #{amount}, #{cropId})
mapper.select:
SELECT T1.STOR_ID, T3.CROP_NAME AS STOR_NAME, T1.AMOUNT, T1.CROP_ID FROM INVENTORY T1
LEFT JOIN SHOP T2 ON T1.STOR_ID = T2.STOR_ID
LEFT JOIN CROP T3 ON T1.CROP_ID = T3.CROP_ID
WHERE T1.AMOUNT > 0 AND T2.ITEM_ID IS NULL ORDER BY T1.STOR_ID DESC
